0.1.0.en: Initial release of the TP-Link Managed Switch app. Provides basic control and monitoring for TP-Link managed switches. Supports discovery of devices on the network and integration with Homey.

0.1.2.en: Added monitoring of the switch port link changes. The ports link status is checked once per minute so it may not detect rapid network topology changes.

0.1.3.en: Updated supported hardware list and added it to the error message when pairing.
